trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects, which in turn represent a grouping of related data points and attributes for the series.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection>類別表示的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>依次代表的一組相關的資料點與數列屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合類別會實作為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>集合的根屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。

trans-unit.source: Series objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at both design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: 序列物件可以附加、 插入或移除在設計階段和執行的階段集合中。

trans-unit.source: When a series is added to the collection, it is automatically assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object named "Default" or, if "Default" does not exist, to the first available chart area in the chart area collection.
trans-unit.target: 當數列加入至集合時，它會自動指派，給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件命名為"Default"或"Default"不存在，要在圖表區域集合中的第一個可用的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> to be added.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> 物件加入至集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> object appended to the collection..
trans-unit.target: 附加至集合中的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Items are always added as the last item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目一律會新增為集合中的最後一個項目中。

trans-unit.source: The `name` argument refers to the `Name` property of the object being added.
trans-unit.target: `name`引數會參考`Name`要加入之物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you use this method to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection> class, the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects of the newly added <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object cannot have more than one Y-value per data point.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**如果您使用這個方法來新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection>類別，相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>新加入之物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>物件不能有每個資料點的多個 Y 值。
